channel.title: Psychic night link and dead evils
channel.description: Does dead unseen and cult not see the psychic link anymore? Just had a game where i couldn't see the psychic link anyone, while the others said he did. I saw no interaction between the Psychic and the linked. Is it a bug or a new implemention?
